prompt: Which of the following describes a continuous variable?

choices.value: The number of items sold at a craft booth for one day
The number of apps downloaded from a website one day
The diameters of the tree trunks at an evergreen farm
The number of baskets made by a basketball player
The shoe sizes of all shoes on sale at a department store

prompt: Data will be collected on the following variables. Which variable can be considered discrete?

choices.value: The length of a person's arm span
The time it takes for a person to solve a puzzle
The number of books a person finished reading last month

prompt:
The following list shows the number of video games sold at a game store each day for one week.

15, 43, 50, 39, 22, 16, 20

Which of the following is the best classification of the data in the list?

choices.value: Neither categorical nor quantitative, and neither discrete nor continuous
